scripts.test: npm run build && rm -f tests/machinecode/*.bin && rm -f tests/machinecode/*.asm && ASAN_OPTIONS=detect_leaks=0 ctest --test-dir build --output-on-failure --gtest_shuffle && npm run objdump
scripts.coverage: npm test && mkdir -p coverage && lcov -d build/ -c -o coverage/coverage.info && lcov -r coverage/coverage.info '*/build/*' '*/11/*' '*/extern/*' '*/tests/*' -o coverage/coverage.filtered.info && genhtml coverage/coverage.filtered.info --output-directory coverage/report && lcov --summary coverage/coverage.filtered.info
